author: Ayesha Tahir
text: I spent two hours alone in this place, but not for a minute felt lonely. author: Ayesha Tahir
text: Wasted a whole day listening to all different point of views in different spaces. Realized first time in my life that crisis in your country will keep you awake & uncomfortable. To the winners, its not going to b easy & to the other side, its not the defeat. May Allah bless Pak♥️

text: simple picture for your followers. There are those who get "it" & those who don't get "it." Those who get it are going to save the world. Those who do not get it are going to destroy it. Also, its not enough to tell ur followers that nonbelievers are bad. U must demonize them.
